## Checklist

- [ ] **Conventional Commit**: The PR title follows the [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/) specification (e.g., `feat:`, `fix:`, `docs:`).
- [ ] **Testing**: New tests have been added or existing tests have been updated to cover the changes.
- [ ] **Linting**: The code has been formatted with `ruff format` and passes `ruff check`.
- [ ] **Security**: No secrets or sensitive information are hardcoded. All changes have been reviewed for security implications.
- [ ] **Documentation**: `runbook.md`, `api.md`, or other relevant documentation has been updated to reflect the changes.
 - [ ] **Auto-doc**: `wo:apply` 실행됨(해당 워크오더 내용이 docs/techspec.md, docs/plan.md에 반영됨)
